message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn to decide!
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to start. Let's see what you think!
A 50/50 split is a good idea, but I'd like to see if we can do better than that. Let's keep negotiating!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to keep a slight edge. Your turn to decide!
I'm willing to give a slight edge to make this deal happen.  Let's get this done!
Alright, Bob, I'll take the deal. 4800 is better than nothing, and I'd rather get something now than risk getting nothing in the end!
